p: An alternative perspective is to consider the evaluation of the breadth from the antibody/antigen binding affinity, see S1 Appendix. This requires an accurate, relatively rapid, method for the calculation of the binding affinity. Research on developing such a methodology is in progress [ 33]. The use of the “free energy of binding breadth”, rather than the “IC 50 neutralizing breadth”, would, in principle, bypass the need for machine learning techniques.
